abstract: Dan Barry This Land column profiles Robert Franz, park ranger at Flight 93 National Memorial in Shanksville, Pa, tasked with recounting story of foiled hijacking of United Airlines flight 93 on September 11, 2001 to visiting public; Franz's military background both drew him to position and helps inform his dramatic retelling of incident.
lead_paragraph: The task of recounting what happened to the jetliner on Sept. 11, 2001, falls to Robert Franz at what is now a national park in Pennsylvania. The emotions are never far away.
snippet: The task of recounting what happened to the jetliner on Sept. 11, 2001, falls to Robert Franz at what is now a national park in Pennsylvania. The emotions are never far away....

headline.main: A Ranger, a Field of Wildflowers and the Retelling of Flight 93
headline.print_headline: A Ranger, a Field and the Flight 93 Story Retold
